as always, please be mindful of the sea life, our neighbors, and anchoring outside of the main traffic channel.

=== enf of Contact Form === === Hero ===
About

EUROPEAN-INSPIRED MENU

a chic, rustic theme envelops every aspect where guests can look forward to an authentic european-inspired gastronomic selection

=== enf of Hero === Hidden behind a picturesque pathway encompassed by lush jungle greenery and ambient lighting, sits Joia Beach , a day-to-night dining destination located in an exclusive enclave on Watson Island. here, sun-drenched sands, sweeping views of biscayne bay and the city skyline, and vibrant pink-hued golden sunsets await. Opened in 2020 and designed by Francois Frossard, Joia Beach has been hailed by condé nast traveler as one of " the best beaches in Miami ." Described as one of the best places in Miami Beach for "those craving a slick beach scene away from Miami Beach’s masses," Joia Beach is Miami's ultimate hidden oasis. Perfect for sunset cocktails, waterfront dinners, and weekend festivities, Joia Beach has quickly become renowned as one of the best Miami beach clubs and restaurants in the magic city. European inspired bites and platters designed for sharing, handcrafted cocktails, and live djs and entertainment redefine South Beach dining and transport you to a place of pure joia . === Hero ===
Information

EUROPEAN-INSPIRED MENU

a chic, rustic theme envelops every aspect where guests can look forward to an authentic european-inspired gastronomic selection

=== enf of Hero === === Contact Form === HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm PARKING & VALET Valet is available for $20 Ride sharing is encouraged Self-parking is only available at Jungle Island ARRIVALS BY YACHT Arrivals by yacht are not permitted at this time.

For reservations arriving by yacht, we ask that you please let us know at the time of booking so we can assist you with tender arrangements to bring you ashore.
As always, please be mindful of the sea life, our neighbors, and anchoring outside of the main traffic channel.

ARRIVALS BY YACHT

For reservations arriving by yacht, we ask that you please let us know at the time of booking so we can assist you with tender arrangements to bring you ashore.
as always, please be mindful of the sea life, our neighbors, and anchoring outside of the main traffic channel.

PETS With the exception of service animals, no pets are allowed. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. JET SKIS Jet skis are not permitted GIFT CARD Purchase Gift Cards === Hero ===

Have Questions?

FAQs View Our FAQ's === enf of Hero === What is the dress code? At Joia Beach , we embrace a European-inspired, upscale beach chic dress code to maintain the elevated experience our guests expect. Proper attire is required for entry, and management reserves the right to refuse access or ask guests to leave if dress code guidelines are not followed. Joia Beach has 3 main areas, the restaurant, the lounge, and the beach club. While we understand that guests visiting our beach may be dressed in beachwear, we ask that appropriate cover-ups be worn when entering the venue. Swimsuits are only permitted within the beach club & lounge areas. Shirts, bottoms, and shoes are required in the restaurant. Note that fishnet cover-ups, offensive clothing, athletic apparel, hoodies, sweatpants, tank tops, cargo pants and slides worn with socks are not permitted in any area of the venue . We appreciate your cooperation in helping us create a refined environment for all. Can I bring my own food or beverages to the beach or restaurant? No external food or beverages are allowed to be brought on to the property. Can I shoot professional photography at joia beach? We do not allow professional photography on the beach or at the restaurant without prior approval. Joia Beach charges a location fee for photographers or brands who want to shoot on site. Can I bring my own decorations and balloons for a birthday party? No external decorations are allowed at Joia Beach without prior approval. Is there self-parking at joia beach? The only self-parking available is at Jungle Island’s main parking garage and the cost is $20. Is gratuity included? Automatic service charge of 20% will be added. 23% service charge will be added to groups of 11 or more Is smoking allowed? No tobacco, cigars or electronic cigarettes are allowed to be smoked under the palapa/inside the restaurant. Smoking is allowed in the designated areas on the beach only. Are children allowed? Children are more than welcome to join us during the day in the dining room, but Joia Beach is not a kid-friendly environment. Guests must be 21+ to enter the Beach Club and Lounge from Friday through Sunday. Are service animals allowed? In accordance with titles II and III of the ADA, Joia Beach welcomes service dogs only. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. With the exception of service animals that meet the federal government’s guidelines for animals trained to perform tasks for the benefit of an individual with a qualifying disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), visitors are not permitted to bring animals on to joia beach property. Visitors may not bring any other animals onto Joia Beach property, including but not limited to pets or emotional support animals. Is there a corkage fee? We do not allow external alcohol to be brought on to the property. Is Joia Beach wheelchair accessible? Yes, we are wheelchair accessible and have ADA bathrooms on Jungle Island’s property right next door. How much is the valet? Our valet is $20 and can be paid with cash or a credit card. How many people does the restaurant seat? 120 people. What's the largest group number I can book for the restaurant? Parties over ten people fall under our large group dining agreements. Can I purchase gift cards for Joia Beach? Gift cards for Joia Beach restaurant may be purchased at the link here Are drones allowed at Joia Beach? Drones may not be operated or used at Joia Beach without prior approval from management under any circumstances. Does Joia Beach offer towel rentals? Yes! Towels are available for rent in our lounge for $15 each. === Hero ===
